verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Yet <S%H5750><s%> will I bring <S%H935><s%> one <S%H259><s%> plague <S%H5061><s%> more on Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and on Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> afterwards <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> he will let you go <S%H7971><s%> hence: <S%H2088><s%> when he shall let you go, <S%H7971><s%> he shall surely thrust <S%H1644><s%> you out hence <S%H2088><s%> altogether. <S%H3617><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and let every man <S%H376><s%> borrow <S%H7592><s%> of his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> and every woman <S%H802><s%> of her neighbor, <S%H7468><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>and jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold. <S%H2091><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%> Moreover <S%H1571><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> servants, <S%H5650><s%> and in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> About midnight <S%H2676><s%> <S%H3915><s%> will I go <S%H3318><s%> out into the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall die, <S%H4191><s%> from the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> that sits <S%H3427><s%> on his throne, <S%H3678><s%> even to the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of the maidservant <S%H8198><s%> that is behind <S%H310><s%> the mill; <S%H7347><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of beasts. <S%H929><s%>

And there shall be a great <S%H1419><s%> cry <S%H6818><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> such <S%H834><s%> as there was none <S%H3808><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> it, nor <S%H3808><s%> shall be like <S%H3644><s%> it any <S%H3254><s%> more. <S%H3254><s%>

But against any <S%H3605><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall not a dog <S%H3611><s%> move <S%H2782><s%> his tongue, <S%H3956><s%> against man <S%H376><s%> or <S%H5704><s%> beast: <S%H929><s%> that you may know <S%H3045><s%> how that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> does put a difference <S%H6395><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> and Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> your servants <S%H5650><s%> shall come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to me, and bow <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> themselves to me, saying, <S%H559><s%> Get <S%H3318><s%> you out, and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that follow <S%H7272><s%> you: and after <S%H310><s%> that I will go <S%H3318><s%> out. And he went <S%H3318><s%> out from Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> in a great <S%H2750><s%> anger. <S%H639><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> shall not listen <S%H8085><s%> to you; that my wonders <S%H4159><s%> may be multiplied <S%H7235><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> wonders <S%H4159><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> so that he would not let the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> out of his land. <S%H776><s%>
